definition: A task involving the restoration or fixing of something that is broken, damaged, or malfunctioning, typically referring to physical objects or equipment. It commonly refers to the act of repairing or maintenance work performed on various items, such as appliances, vehicles, machinery, or household items.

examples.german: Die Reparaturarbeit am Auto dauerte den ganzen Tag.
examples.english: The repair work on the car took the whole day.

examples.german: Er ist ein Experte für Reparaturarbeiten an elektronischen Geräten.
examples.english: He is an expert in repairing electronic devices.

examples.german: Die Reparaturarbeit an der Brücke wird voraussichtlich mehrere Wochen dauern.
examples.english: The repair work on the bridge is expected to take several weeks.

examples.german: Die Reparaturarbeit an der Heizung wurde erfolgreich abgeschlossen.
examples.english: The repair work on the heating system has been successfully completed.

examples.german: Die Reparaturarbeit an der Waschmaschine war teurer als erwartet.
examples.english: The repair work on the washing machine was more expensive than expected.
